attributes.action: Raise the amount of money people get on JSA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: £50 a week to live off is a tiny amount considering you can get £200 - £300 a week for a full time job. Most of this is required to run a car or pay bills. So if your claiming JSA and want Gordon Brown to increase your weekly payment, sign this petition. This will also help younger people get driving licenses and pay insurance which will allow them to travel further to find work.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
